name: Flexterion 23
description:
Flexterion 23 is dynamic science fiction first person shooter with Mr. Skynet. 

Some people have teamed up with alien beings to seize power over the world.

Captain Fufels stole an atomic bomb from the Japanese in order to blow up the Hawaiian Islands and a Mr. Bratox is trying to prevent.

You have to fight the aliens of an alternative future who are trying to take over the Earth...
